headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BERENDSEN, MILDRED J

snippet: BERENDSEN--Mildred J. The Board of Trustees of The New York Center for Living mourns the death of its Trustee Mildred Jeanmaire Berendsen. Her breadth of knowledge, passion, vision and commitment were invaluable to The Center's success. She was an exceptional Trustee and her kindness and warmth will be greatly missed. We send our heartfelt condolences to her husband Charlie and her sister Liliane. Elizabeth R. Kabler, President Cera B. Robbins, Treasurer 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERENDSEN--Mildred J. The Board of Trustees of The New York Center for Living mourns the death of its Trustee Mildred Jeanmaire Berendsen. Her breadth of knowledge, passion, vision and commitment were invaluable to The Center's success. She was an exceptional Trustee and her kindness and warmth will be greatly missed. We send our heartfelt condolences to her husband Charlie and her sister Liliane. Elizabeth R. Kabler, President Cera B. Robbins, Treasurer 1/3
